motivational.quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
motivational.author: Confucius

motivational.quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
motivational.author: Theodore Roosevelt

motivational.quote: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
motivational.author: Steve Jobs

motivational.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
motivational.author: Winston Churchill

technology.quote: The advance of technology is based on making it fit in so that you don't really even notice it.
technology.author: Bill Gates

technology.quote: It's not that we use technology, we live technology.
technology.author: Godfrey Reggio

technology.quote: Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
technology.author: Arthur C. Clarke

technology.quote: Technology is best when it brings people together.
technology.author: Matt Mullenweg

technology.quote: The human spirit must prevail over technology.
technology.author: Albert Einstein

creativity.quote: Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
creativity.author: Pablo Picasso

creativity.quote: You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
creativity.author: Maya Angelou

creativity.quote: Creativity is contagious, pass it on.
creativity.author: Albert Einstein

creativity.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
creativity.author: Scott Adams

leadership.quote: Leadership is not about being in charge. It is about taking care of those in your charge.
leadership.author: Simon Sinek

leadership.quote: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
leadership.author: Ronald Reagan

leadership.quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
leadership.author: John C. Maxwell

leadership.quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
leadership.author: Steve Jobs

leadership.quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
leadership.author: John F. Kennedy

life.quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
life.author: John Lennon

life.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
life.author: Dalai Lama

life.quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
life.author: Confucius

life.quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
life.author: Abraham Lincoln

life.quote: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
life.author: Charles R. Swindoll
